snippet: Can you solve the case of a middle-aged woman with horrific leg wounds that don't respond to one of our most powerful antibiotics? Dr. Lisa Sanders invites readers to solve a real medical mystery.
abstract: Can you solve the case of a middle-aged woman with horrific leg wounds that don't respond to one of our most powerful antibiotics? Dr. Lisa Sanders invites readers to solve a real medical mystery.

headline.main: Think Like a Doctor: A Terrible Leg Wound
